urlset: <%$full_serverhome%> <%section name=j loop=$menu_lines_oid%> <%if $menu_lines_ssrub[j] eq 0%> <%$fullself%><%$menu_lines_selfurl[j]%> <%/if%> <%/section%> <%section name=k loop=$menubot_lines_oid%> <%if $menubot_lines_ssrub[k] eq 0%> <%$fullself%><%$menubot_lines_selfurl[k]%> <%/if%> <%/section%>
